about_the_game:
Return to the kingdom of Senenthia in a brand new Story Pack that expands the intriguing lore of Across the Obelisk. Set 10 years before the base game, experience the legendary Wolf Wars through the canine eyes of Magnus and Yogger. Unlock a new hero, a pet, new skins and much more!




The Wolf Wars is packed with lore to build your knowledge of the Across the Obelisk universe and content that can be unlocked and experienced in the base game.

  • Discover a brand new, independent zone. Travel back in time and see Senenthia as never before.
  • Develop a fresh understanding of the events of the Wolf Wars, its fierce battles and the heroes who waged them.
  • Discover more about the complex relationship between Magnus and Yogger.
  • Replay the zone and choose different paths to reach the war's final goal.
  • Complete the Wolf Wars story and unlock Yogger, a mighty warrior who likes to play with his food.
  • Succeed on your quest and you’ll be rewarded with a new pet too, the wolf cub Wolfy.
  • Receive five Wolf Wars-themed skins exclusive to this Story Pack.
  • Encounter new events featuring the younger versions of familiar characters. Complete them and unlock new skins for each of these heroes.
  • Pit your wits against new monsters and fearsome bosses that will then appear in random combat encounters across base game modes.
  • Pay close attention during Acts 2 and 3; you might just encounter a random event that unlocks a previously undiscovered path.
  • Playing co-op? Only one adventurer needs to own Wolf Wars for the whole party to enjoy the story.
detailed_description:
Return to the kingdom of Senenthia in a brand new Story Pack that expands the intriguing lore of Across the Obelisk. Set 10 years before the base game, experience the legendary Wolf Wars through the canine eyes of Magnus and Yogger. Unlock a new hero, a pet, new skins and much more!




The Wolf Wars is packed with lore to build your knowledge of the Across the Obelisk universe and content that can be unlocked and experienced in the base game.

  • Discover a brand new, independent zone. Travel back in time and see Senenthia as never before.
  • Develop a fresh understanding of the events of the Wolf Wars, its fierce battles and the heroes who waged them.
  • Discover more about the complex relationship between Magnus and Yogger.
  • Replay the zone and choose different paths to reach the war's final goal.
  • Complete the Wolf Wars story and unlock Yogger, a mighty warrior who likes to play with his food.
  • Succeed on your quest and you’ll be rewarded with a new pet too, the wolf cub Wolfy.
  • Receive five Wolf Wars-themed skins exclusive to this Story Pack.
  • Encounter new events featuring the younger versions of familiar characters. Complete them and unlock new skins for each of these heroes.
  • Pit your wits against new monsters and fearsome bosses that will then appear in random combat encounters across base game modes.
  • Pay close attention during Acts 2 and 3; you might just encounter a random event that unlocks a previously undiscovered path.
  • Playing co-op? Only one adventurer needs to own Wolf Wars for the whole party to enjoy the story.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
